title: When you are Shen, and you see an ally is about to lose a close duel

replies.body: Even if this wasn't completely relevant, i would still give you an upvote because of Space Jam
And that's why you Always ban shen guys......

> [{quoted}](name=StickyDice,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vPV5R8EA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-12T15:26:36.264+0000)
>
> And that's why you Always pick shen guys......

Fixed that for you
who the hell bans shen?
Shen USED to be pick/ban all the time, didn't he?
People who don't want to let {{champion:32}} think he has friends just because top lane is trying to keep me from feeding when I go full noob as a jungle.
People who don't like the "I got you fam" Meta.

No you ban {{champion:98}}, {{champion:85}}, and {{champion:84}} because nijas are OP. Unfortunately you have to hope the other team bans {{champion:238}} or you are still in trouble.

Pro tip: If {{champion:238}} is picked (remember, ban the other 3 because ninja synergy is even more powerful than ninjas in the shadows) then you have to pick {{champion:106}} because bears beat hunters in hunter, bear, ninja. (ninja assassinates hunter, hunter shoots bear, bear mauls ninja when ninja surprises the bear; all of them beat rock, paper, and scissors because they just do)
the actual secret is {{champion:54}}  beats them all. because if someone decides they beat rock, you can punch them in the face with your already clenched fist.

And then {{champion:48}}'s Pillar of Filth interrupts the Channel.

https://usatlife.files.wordpress.com/2014/06/giphy-3.gif?w=500

And he ults and duels the disoriented Shen.

Shen is confused.....

Shen hurts himself in his confusion.

Space Jam reference. Automatic upvote. 

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/676/238/dfe.gif
um, aren't those downvotes?
nah, just orange upvotes

I was under the impression that to differentiate between them in gifs, in case of orientation flips, that upvotes were green and downvotes were orange.

Also the gif you used gives me the impression that they are trying to shoot down the thread/post.
I get that. In most gif upvotes are green. Downvotes are red. I have seen gifs where upvotes are orange and downvotes are blue. That's why I left the caption to avoid confusion.
never seen red or blue, but i have seen some gifs that involved orange and seeing people saying those were downvotes.  Thats were that came from for me.

Downvotes shouldn't exist on the M&G board but here is a downvote gif that makes me laugh.

http://cdn0.dailydot.com/uploaded/images/original/2013/2/7/upvotegis9.gif
That is amazing
Had to add this to my collection of gifs. It's too good. XD
When playing as Shen, I like to wait as the final auto attack is in flight to kill my teammate then ult them.

then you don' t manage to kill the enemy in time, the shield expires and the ally gets killed.

or the mandatory jinx ult

That's usually the worst time to do it. Sure it saves them but generally speaking your teammates will almost always be attempting to run away. Your shield will just mean they got a second shot and continue running while you're getting mispositioned by miles ahead. Ending up at bot lane T2 turret at level 6 while your top lane enemy is getting a free top turret. The 300g you saved the enemy from basically gave 750g to the entire team.

It's better to do it when you know your enemy is going to overcommit and your ally isn't showing signs of backing down (usually after any dashes/cc expire and the enemy is duking it out).
+1 For Bill Murray, our savior.
I approve of this post. Shenpai has noticed you.
+1 for the Space Jam reference.
And then you're splitsecond too late because you underestimated enemy burst.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qH4NbO74A1k
